createSchedule.TITLE: Create schedule
createSchedule.SUBTITLE: Enter parameters for creating a schedule below.
createSchedule.SUBTITLE_TWO_COLUMNS: Enter parameters a schedule below. Some of the input choices on this page are dynamic and populated as per previous options selected.
createSchedule.CREATE_CRON_EXPRESSION_INFO_TOOLTIP:
Cron expression representing a schedule. It consists of six fields that accept a single value or a range of values as follows:
<sec> <min> <hr> <day of month> <month> <day of week>
Examples:
0 0 * * * *  - the top of every hour of every day.
*/10 * * * * *  - every ten seconds.
0 0 8-10 * * *  - 8, 9, and 10 o'clock every day.
0 0 6,19 * * *  - 6:00 AM and 7:00 PM every day.
0 0/30 8-10 * * *  - 8:00, 8:30, 9:00, 9:30, 10:00, and 10:30 every day.
0 0 9-17 * * MON-FRI  - on the hour nine-to-five on weekdays.
0 0 0 25 12 ?  - every Christmas Day at midnight, regardless of the weekday.
createSchedule.INVALID_CRON_XSS: Unsafe characters found in cron expression
createSchedule.INVALID_CRON_NOT_SIX_FIELDS: Cron expression must have six fields separated with a single space
